meanings.sent1: My roomies and I always have movie nights on Fridays.
meanings.sent2: I live with my roomies in a cozy apartment near campus.
meanings.sent3: Our roomies decided to have a pizza party in the living room.
meanings.sent4: Even though we are just roomies, we feel like a small family.
meanings.sent5: The bond between roomies can be as strong as siblings.

meanings.definition: Roomies: plural form of roomie, meaning a person with whom one shares a room or living space
meanings.sent1: My roomies are very tidy and always keep our shared space clean.
meanings.sent2: I have two roomies in my dormitory at college.
meanings.sent3: One of my roomies has a funny habit of talking in their sleep.
meanings.sent4: Living with roomies can teach you a lot about compromise and communication.
meanings.sent5: My roomies and I take turns cooking dinner for each other every night.
